# Getting Started

# What is vuse-rx?

vuse-rx is a bridge library: it connects vue's reactive states and refs with rxjs observables and subjects in a way that enforces separation of concerns and reduces boilerplate code.

It's fully typed and therefore has first-class TypeScript support.

More details here.

# Install

# NPM / YARN

npm i vuse-rx

yarn add vuse-rx

# Native browser

<script type="module" src="https://unpkg.com/vuse-rx"></script>

<!-- or a complete package with polyfills and etc. -->
<script src="https://unpkg.com/vuse-rx/dist/umd.js"></script>

# Use

See recipes or api for detailed usage instructions.
